channel.title: Webclient help please!
channel.description:
Try this out www.freewebs.com/edge-pkz/webclient.htm thats what i tried to make and my htm code is [code]<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd"> <html> <head> <title>Edge-PKz - The Massive Online Pking Private Server Game by -Nemesis-</title> <body bgcolor="#000000"> <body bgcolor="rgb(0,0,0)"> <body bgcolor="black"> <CENTER> </applet> <applet width=766 height=503 code="client.class" archive="www.freewebs.com/edge-pkz/deob2.jar"> <param name="deob2.jar" value=""> </applet> </CENTER> </head>
[/code] What went wrong? I signed the .Jar File by [code]@echo off jarsigner rscdeob.jar path.to.the.ClassFile pause[/code] and [code]keytool -genkey -alias path.to.the.ClassFile pause[/code] But it is not working as you see...Did my HTML Code went wrong or something on client?
